abstract: The Financial Conduct Authority fined David Caplin, formerly the firm’s chief executive, and Jeremy Kraft, a former compliance officer, in a case related to manipulation of the London interbank offered rate.
snippet: The Financial Conduct Authority fined David Caplin, formerly the firm’s chief executive, and Jeremy Kraft, a former compliance officer, in a case related to manipulation of the London interbank offered rate.

headline.main: Britain Fines and Bans 2 Former RP Martin Executives Over Compliance Failures
